content.rendered:
Betika Review.

Betika  is in the mid-range of sports betting sites available and offers a very pleasant betting experience. In spite of having less offers than other betting sites, Betika will still prove sufficient for most bettors who are looking for a betting experience focused on sports.

Betika at a glance.

Jackpots – 7/10

Features – 7/10

Markets Offered – 8/10

Ease of Use – 9/10

Bonuses – 7/10.

Summary.

Betika offers a very pleasant betting experience. Unlike other sites, Betika focuses solely on sports betting without all the unnecessary distractions. This makes Betika the best option for those focused on sports betting only. The site has an easy to use interface, numerous markets and an easy jackpot to play.

OVERALL

7.6/10

Pros.

Virtual play

Referral bonuses

Massive bonuses to new users

Low minimum amounts to bet with

Instant deposits

Decent odds

Variety of sports to bet on

Cons.

Poor site graphics

Cashout not available

No live betting

Complicated withdrawal

Low jackpot amounts

Deposit fee.

In-Depth Review

Betika offers some of the major football leagues and the soccer jackpot takes in the English Premier League, La Liga and French Premier Lige1, offers the gamer an opportunity to place a stake on some of the most entertaining football every weekend.

Homepage.

Features

Betika offers some of the major football leagues and the soccer jackpot takes in the English Premier League, La Liga and French Premier Lige1, offers the gamer an opportunity to place a stake on some of the most entertaining football every weekend.

The site offers a 2 million Kenyan Shillings jackpot prize for correctly predicting the scores of 12 scheduled fixtures. This is a decent grand prize but falls behind some of the major players in regard to substantial winnings yet on the plus side offers more than a host of competing sites.

The site offers an interesting Lucky Number lottery similar in vein to the Virtual play feature with games being played every few minutes. The bets are not traditional lottery stakes and a punter can pick one number to appear at 8/1 odds and the odds increase as the bet-maker opts for more numbers. There are bets on even or odd numbers drawn while predicting the right colors appearing.

The site looks like it is mainly set up for football, other popular sports and lottery play.

Know more about HelaBet

Registration

Registering on this site is a simple process and a mobile phone number and username is all that is needed. SMS BETIKA to 290290 and a code will be sent to by the same number and you automatically become a member.

Sponsorship

Offical Sofapaka F.C sponsors

Jackpot

The site offers a weekly jackpot of 2 million Kenyan Shillings jackpot prize for correctly predicting the scores of 12 selections from different leagues across the world. Jackpot amount to bet on is Ksh 100.

Sports You Can Bet On.

Darts

Football

Cricket

Handball

Ice Hockey

Rugby

Snooker

Tennis

Volleyball

Lottery

Lottery games

Pros.

Virtual play

Referral bonuses

Massive bonuses to new users

Low minimum amounts to bet with

Instant deposits

Decent odds

Variety of sports to bet on

Cons

Poor site graphics

Cashout not available

No live betting

Complicated withdrawal

Low jackpot amounts

Deposit fee

Betika FAQ

What is Betika Mpesa Paybill Number?

business number 290290

What is the Betika Customer Care Contacts

O729290290 0780290290

How to Withdraw From Betika?

Send the word WITHDRAW#AMOUNT to 29090 and your money will be transferred to your Mpesa account. Betika will send an SMS notification to all the winners and they will see to it that your money is deposited into the winners’ BETIKA account a few minutes after the game ends

Read more of EliteBet

How do I deposit cash into Betika?

Go to the Mpesa Menu, Lipa na Mpesa, Go to pay bill number and enter business number 290290 Under account number type ‘BETIKA’ Enter the amount you wish to deposit

How Do I bet via SMS on Betika?

send an SMS with the word ‘BETIKA’ to 29090 and Betika will send you the current football match fixtures and their odds and you will receive more games by repeating the same process. Single bet Send a message with [GAMEID#PICK#AMOUNT] to 29090.PICk stands for the odds Multibet For a multi bet send [GAMEID#PICK#GAMEID#PICK#AMOUNT] to 29090 with as many matches you want bet on .

Sababisha daily jackpot 300,000

Midweek 15/15/15

Save stake

Casino
